## Feature Summary
A brief description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? What pain point does it address?

## Proposed Solution
Describe your proposed solution in detail.

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions you've considered.

## User Impact
Who would benefit from this feature? How many users would this affect?

## Implementation Notes
Any technical details or considerations for implementation.

## Mockups/Screenshots
If applicable, add mockups or screenshots of the proposed feature.

## Additional Context
Add any other context or information about the feature request.
